p: The sizes of the DF epidemic were associated with the UVsâ€™ area. In the UVs with recorded DF cases, the number of DF cases (the total in the study period) was strongly associated with acreage of these UVs ( r = 0.45, P = 0.015), as shown in Table 2. Similarly, on the grid scale, the counts of DF cases were significantly correlated with the gridded UVs acreage ( r = 0.33, P = 0.000) in the infected units.
